pages.text: veimma tu`ridanne `anhumu-btigae rahmetim mir rabbike tercuha fekul lehum kavlem meysura
vela tec`al yedeke magluleten ila `unukike vela tebsutha kulle-lbesti fetak`ude melumem mahsura
inne rabbeke yebsutu-rrizka limey yesau veyakdir. innehu kane bi`ibadihi habiram besira
vela taktulu evladekum hasyete imlak. nahnu nerzukuhum veiyyakum. inne katlehum kane hit'en kebira
vela takrabu-zzina innehu kane fahiseten. vesae sebila
vela taktulu-nnefse-lleti harrame-llahu illa bilhakk. vemen kutile mazlumen fekad ce`alna liveliyyihi sultanen fela yusrif fi-lkatl. innehu kane mensura
vela takrabu male-lyetimi illa billeti hiye ahsenu hatta yebluga esuddeh. veevfu bil`ahd. inne-l`ahde kane mes'ula
veevfu-lkeyle iza kiltum vezinu bilkistasi-lmustekim. zalike hayruv veahsenu te'vila
vela takfu ma leyse leke bihi `ilm. inne-ssem`a velbesara velfuade kullu ulaike kane `anhu mes'ula
vela temsi fi-l'ardi meraha. inneke len tahrika-l'arda velen tebluga-lcibale tula
kullu zalike kane seyyiuhu `inde rabbike mekruha
